This event offers an unforgettable experience across tree-lined trails, sweeping views, and well-maintained off-road paths that are a true pleasure to explore on foot. Starting and finishing at Queen Elizabeth Country Park near Petersfield, participants follow a beautifully varied route through the park's hard-packed trails, immersing themselves in the natural charm of the surrounding landscape. Walkers head out through the ancient woodland of Head Down before joining the iconic South Downs Way, an unforgettable stretch of national trail. ... raw.full_description: Queen Elizabeth Country Park Trail Run (Nr Petersfield), Hampshire - Saturday, 31st January 2026 Experience the ultimate Hampshire trail running event, set in the South Downs National Park, featuring spectacular tree-lined trails, magnificent views, and well-maintained off-road paths that are a pleasure to run on. The route starts and finishes at Queen Elizabeth Country Park (Nr Petersfield), exploring its hard-packed trail network and immersing you in the natural beauty of the area. ... Read more Runners head out of the park through ancient woodland at Head Down before reaching the iconic South Downs Way. From here, both routes loop back via this famous trail. Back in the park, all three routes combine to explore War Down, featuring tree-lined gravel tracks that allow your mind to wander as your legs clock up the kilometers. This trail run offers a unique opportunity to experience multiple terrains, stunning views, and a true sense of connection with nature, perfect for anyone looking to enjoy a scenic UK trail running adventure. Suitable for runners of all abilities, the event offers three route lengths to choose from - 21k Half Marathon, 15k and 8k. Every runner will enjoy: Chip Timed Event High-quality Metal Medal Finisher's Goodie and Refreshing Drink Personalised Certificate First Aid Cover On-course Refreshments Friendly Marshals If you're searching for a trail in Hampshire, a Half Marathon, 15k or 8k near me or a South Downs Trail Run, the Queen Elizabeth Country Park Run is a must do event.
